short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for quickly purchasing summoning shards directly from the Summoning skill menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick purchase shards based on the currently selected recipe. No more having to hop between the shop and summoning screens.
